en: We communicated with each other by gesture.
zh: 我们用手势互相交流。

en: We bought a pound of tea.
zh: 我们买了一磅茶叶。

en: We partook in each other's joy.
zh: 我们分享彼此的快乐。

en: We agreed among ourselves.
zh: 我们私下达成了协议。

en: We use gestures as well as words to communicate with others.
zh: 我们用手势和语言与他人交流。

en: We kept track of all our expenses while we were in Australia.
zh: 我们在澳大利亚的时候，记录了所有的开销。

en: We received a large parcel.
zh: 我们收到一个大包裹。

en: We went up and down by elevator.
zh: 我们乘电梯上下。

en: We mustn't waste our energy resources.
zh: 我们不能浪费能源。

en: We must reduce energy demand.
zh: 我们必须减少能源需求。

en: We spoke about many subjects.
zh: 我们谈论了很多话题。

en: We can communicate with each other in many ways.
zh: 我们可以用很多方式互相交流。

en: We talked of many things.
zh: 我们谈了很多事情。

en: We should always keep our promise.
zh: 我们应该永远信守承诺。

en: We should always act in obedience to the law.
zh: 我们应该永远遵守法律。

en: We must always stand up for our rights.
zh: 我们必须永远捍卫我们的权利。

en: We are always exposed to some kind of danger.
zh: 我们总是暴露在某种危险之中。

en: We had an early lunch and set out at 12:30.
zh: 我们吃了早午餐，并在12点30分出发。

en: We started all at once.
zh: 我们一下子都开始了。

en: We will someday make the world a better place.
zh: 我们总有一天会让世界变得更美好。

en: We shall all die some day.
zh: 我们总有一天都会死的。

en: We will run short of oil some day.
zh: 我们总有一天会面临石油短缺。

en: We hired a car for a week when we were in Italy.
zh: 我们在意大利的时候租了一辆车，租期一周。

en: We must achieve our aim at any price.
zh: 我们必须不惜一切代价实现我们的目标。

en: We have every advantage over them.
zh: 我们比他们有各种优势。

en: We must go forward getting the better of all obstacles.
zh: 我们必须克服一切障碍，勇往直前。

en: We should keep every school open and every teacher in his job.
zh: 我们应该保持所有学校开放，并保证每位老师都有工作。

en: We tried to eliminate all danger beforehand.
zh: 我们试图事先消除所有危险。

en: We were nearly frozen to death.
zh: 我们差点被冻死了。

en: Are we making a nonstop flight to the U.S.?
zh: 我们是直飞美国吗？

en: We ran down the hill.
zh: 我们跑下了山。

en: We should deny our children things too sweet.
zh: 我们应该拒绝给孩子们太甜的东西。

en: We are in a fierce competition with that company.
zh: 我们正与那家公司进行激烈的竞争。

en: We made the best of that bad situation.
zh: 我们充分利用了那糟糕的局面。

en: We cannot meet your needs.
zh: 我们无法满足您的需求。

en: We are looking to you for help.
zh: 我们正在向您寻求帮助。

en: How lucky we are to have had the opportunity to work with you!
zh: 我们真幸运，有机会和您一起工作！

en: We expect you to carry out what you have once promised.
zh: 我们希望您履行您曾经承诺过的事情。

en: We were running to and fro.
zh: 我们来回奔跑。

en: We looked for it high and low.
zh: 我们到处寻找它。

en: We will fight to the last.
zh: 我们将战斗到最后一刻。

en: We have made up our minds to fight it out.
zh: 我们已经下定决心要战斗到底。

en: We have breakfast at seven.
zh: 我们七点吃早餐。

en: We got to the station at six.
zh: 我们六点到达车站。

en: We have enjoyed peace for more than forty years.
zh: 我们已经享受了四十多年的和平。

en: We have enjoyed peace for more than 40 years.
zh: 我们已经享受了40多年的和平。

en: We arrived at an agreement after two hours' discussion.
zh: 经过两个小时的讨论，我们达成了一致。

en: We retire at eleven o'clock.
zh: 我们十一点睡觉。

en: We should look after our parents.
zh: 我们应该照顾我们的父母。

en: Can we create something out of nothing?
zh: 我们能从无到有创造出什么吗？

en: We regard him as a great man.
zh: 我们认为他是一个伟人。

en: We asked several questions of him.
zh: 我们问了他几个问题。

en: In everyday life we have many obligations and responsibilities.
zh: 在日常生活中，我们有很多义务和责任。

en: We arrived on the island two days later.
zh: 两天后我们到达了那个岛屿。

en: We work by day, and rest by night.
zh: 我们白天工作，晚上休息。

en: We will not tolerate anyone who engages in terrorism.
zh: 我们绝不容忍任何从事恐怖主义活动的人。

en: We have a plentiful supply of water.
zh: 我们有充足的供水。

en: We know that just being born with a good mind is not enough.
zh: 我们知道，仅仅天生聪明是不够的。

en: Newspapers, magazines, and newscasts tell what is going on in the world.
zh: 报纸、杂志和新闻广播告诉我们世界上正在发生的事情。

en: We have to play fair, whether we win or lose.
zh: 无论输赢，我们都必须公平竞争。

en: We must make do with what we have got.
zh: 我们必须利用我们所拥有的东西。

en: It is not until we lose our health that we realize the value of it.
zh: 直到我们失去健康，我们才意识到它的价值。

en: More than ever do we need goals or leading ideas that will give purpose to whatever we are doing.
zh: 我们比以往任何时候都更需要目标或指导思想，以便为我们所做的一切赋予意义。

en: All we have to do is to try our best.
zh: 我们所要做的就是尽力而为。

en: We took a rest one after the other.
zh: 我们一个接一个地休息。

en: We ran all the way to the station.
zh: 我们一路跑到车站。

en: We'll finish the work even if it takes us all day.
zh: 即使要花我们一整天的时间，我们也要完成这项工作。

en: We insist that this project be carried out immediately.
zh: 我们坚持立即执行这个项目。

en: We have a substantial stake in the venture.
zh: 我们在这项事业中拥有重大利益。

en: Our train went at 200 kilometers an hour.
zh: 我们的火车以每小时200公里的速度行驶。

en: We are cruising at an altitude of 39,000 feet.
zh: 我们以39,000英尺的高度巡航。

en: The purpose of our trip is to visit a new factory.
zh: 我们这次旅行的目的是参观一家新工厂。

en: Our trip was unattended by adventures.
zh: 我们的旅行没有发生什么冒险的事情。

en: The time has come for us to stand up.
zh: 现在是我们站起来的时候了。

en: Our interests conflict with theirs.
zh: 我们的利益与他们的利益相冲突。

en: Our interests seem to conflict with each other.
zh: 我们的利益似乎互相冲突。

en: Our interests clash with theirs.
zh: 我们的利益和他们的利益相冲突。

en: We cannot make a change in our schedule.
zh: 我们无法更改我们的日程安排。

en: Let's drink a toast to our friends!
zh: 让我们为我们的朋友们干杯！

en: Our friendship did not last.
zh: 我们的友谊没有持续下去。

en: Our friendship remained firm.
zh: 我们的友谊依然坚定。

en: Our baseball diamond is very small.
zh: 我们的棒球场非常小。

en: Our problem is how to get in touch with him.
zh: 我们的问题是如何与他取得联系。

en: Our eyes take time to adjust to the darkness.
zh: 我们的眼睛需要时间来适应黑暗。

en: Cars are running one after another before our eyes.
zh: 汽车一辆接一辆地从我们眼前驶过。

en: We have the edge on them.
zh: 我们比他们有优势。

en: Our insurance policy covers various kinds of damages.
zh: 我们的保险单涵盖各种损害。

en: Our flight was canceled.
zh: 我们的航班被取消了。

en: In our culture, we can't be married to two women at once.
zh: 在我们的文化中，我们不能同时娶两个女人。

en: In our culture, a man is allowed to be married to only one wife at a time.
zh: 在我们的文化中，一个男人一次只能娶一个妻子。

en: Our total debts amount to ten thousand dollars.
zh: 我们的总债务达一万美元。

en: Our plane took off exactly on time at six.
zh: 我们的飞机在六点准时起飞。

en: I have a strong conviction that our judgement was right.
zh: 我坚信我们的判断是正确的。

en: Our bodies are our gardens, to which our wills are gardeners.
zh: 我们的身体是我们的花园，而我们的意志是园丁。

en: All our things were turned upside down.
zh: 我们所有的东西都被翻了个底朝天。

en: Our ownership in the company is 60%.
zh: 我们公司占股60%。

en: Even our brains are all subject to the laws of physics.
zh: 即使我们的大脑也受到物理定律的支配。

en: Our efforts did not result in success.
zh: 我们的努力没有取得成功。

en: All our effort ended in failure.
zh: 我们所有的努力都以失败告终。

en: All our efforts were in vain.
zh: 我们所有的努力都是徒劳的。

en: The question before us is an urgent one.
zh: 我们面前的问题非常紧迫。

en: Our city sits on an active fault.
zh: 我们的城市坐落在一个活跃的断层上。

en: There are none of us who do not respect his honesty.
zh: 我们当中没有人不尊重他的诚实。

en: We have a traitor among us.
zh: 我们当中有一个叛徒。

en: Insofar as we know, he is guilty.
zh: 就我们所知，他是有罪的。

en: Our representative argued against the new tax plan.
zh: 我们的代表反对新的税收计划。

en: Our mutual understanding is indispensable.
zh: 我们彼此的理解是不可或缺的。

en: Only a handful of activists are articulate in our union.
zh: 在我们的工会中，只有少数积极分子能言善辩。

en: Our class consists of fifty boys.
zh: 我们班由五十个男生组成。

en: We have many difficulties before us.
zh: 我们面前有很多困难。

en: Our boat drifted to shore on the tide.
zh: 我们的船随着潮水漂到了岸边。

en: Our advance was checked.
zh: 我们的前进受到了阻碍。

en: Our boat followed a school of fish.
zh: 我们的船跟随一群鱼。

en: Our boat approached the small island.
zh: 我们的船靠近了那个小岛。

en: Our ancestors knew how to read the stars.
zh: 我们的祖先知道如何观测星象。

en: Our teacher is at once stern and kindly.
zh: 我们的老师既严厉又慈祥。

en: Our teacher is stern to us.
zh: 我们的老师对我们很严厉。

en: Our lives are determined by our environment.
zh: 我们的生活由我们的环境决定。

en: Our arrival at Narita was delayed by an hour.
zh: 我们到达成田机场的时间延误了一个小时。

en: Our success depends on whether he helps us or not.
zh: 我们的成功取决于他是否帮助我们。

en: Our success was due in part to good luck.
zh: 我们的成功部分归功于好运。

en: Our success depends upon whether you will help us or not.
zh: 我们的成功取决于你是否愿意帮助我们。

en: Our character is affected by the environment.
zh: 我们的性格受到环境的影响。

en: Our world is only one small part of the universe.
zh: 我们的世界只是宇宙中很小的一部分。

en: Are there other universes outside our own?
zh: 在我们的宇宙之外还有其他的宇宙吗？

en: We are not hypocrites in our sleep.
zh: 我们睡觉的时候不是伪君子。

en: Our true nationality is mankind.
zh: 我们真正的国籍是人类。

en: Our new school building is under construction.
zh: 我们的新教学楼正在建设中。

en: Our new head office is in Tokyo.
zh: 我们的新总部设在东京。

en: Our supply of food is exhausted.
zh: 我们的食物供应已经耗尽。

en: No one can find fault with our new plan.
zh: 没有人能挑出我们新计划的毛病。

en: Our food supplies will last till April.
zh: 我们的食物供应将持续到四月。

en: The outlook for our business isn't good.
zh: 我们公司的前景不容乐观。

en: Our victory is secure.
zh: 我们的胜利是有保障的。

en: We seemed secure of victory.
zh: 我们似乎肯定会获胜。

en: The ice will crack beneath our weight.
zh: 冰会承受不住我们的重量而裂开。

en: Our income is small, but we get by.
zh: 我们的收入很小，但我们勉强过得去。

en: We had five dollars left between us.
zh: 我们两人之间只剩下五美元了。

en: Our debt is more than we can pay.
zh: 我们的债务超过了我们的偿还能力。

en: Our car was fast and soon got ahead of the other cars.
zh: 我们的车速度很快，很快就超过了其他的车。

en: Our public leaders are imaginative and often come up with new ideas.
zh: 我们的公众领袖富有想象力，并且经常提出新的想法。

en: Our experiment went wrong last week.
zh: 我们的实验上周出错了。

en: Our experiment has revealed that his report was unreliable.
zh: 我们的实验表明他的报告不可靠。

en: Our experiment has revealed that his report was inaccurate.
zh: 我们的实验表明他的报告不准确。

en: The reasons for our failure are as follows.
zh: 我们失败的原因如下。

en: Let's synchronize our watches.
zh: 让我们对一下表。

en: Ours is a mechanical age.
zh: 我们现在是机械时代。

en: Our attempt has proved to be a failure.
zh: 我们的尝试已被证明是失败的。

en: I have a high regard for the integrity of our mayor.
zh: 我非常尊重我们市长的正直。

en: Our city has one third as many people as Tokyo.
zh: 我们城市的人口是东京的三分之一。

en: Our work is almost over.
zh: 我们的工作差不多结束了。

en: The success of our business depends on the weather.
zh: 我们企业的成功取决于天气。

en: Our top priority is to settle this dispute once and for all, so we are ready to meet them halfway.
zh: 我们的首要任务是一劳永逸地解决这场争端，所以我们准备和他们各让一步。

en: After our first attack, the enemy fled.
zh: 在我们第一次进攻后，敌人逃跑了。

en: Our country borders on several countries.
zh: 我们国家与几个国家接壤。

en: Winter sports are very popular in our country.
zh: 冬季运动在我们国家非常受欢迎。

en: Our factories are working at full capacity.
zh: 我们的工厂正在全负荷运转。

en: Our factory needs a lot of machinery.
zh: 我们的工厂需要很多机器。

en: Our negotiations broke off.
zh: 我们的谈判破裂了。

en: Far from being a failure, our negotiation was a great success.
zh: 我们的谈判远非失败，而是一次巨大的成功。

en: I will help you for the sake of our old friendship.
zh: 为了我们之间的老友谊，我会帮助你。

en: Our calculations show that the rocket is off its course.
zh: 我们的计算表明，火箭偏离了航线。

en: We must adapt our plan to these new circumstances.
zh: 我们必须根据这些新的情况调整我们的计划。

en: Our plans are taking shape.
zh: 我们的计划正在成形。

en: Our plan was fully realized.
zh: 我们的计划完全实现了。

en: Our plans are not yet concrete.
zh: 我们的计划尚未具体。

en: The problem with our plan is not so much the cost as it is the time required.
zh: 我们计划的问题不在于成本，而在于所需的时间。

en: There has been an alteration in our plans.
zh: 我们的计划已经有所改变。

en: Our plan has lots of advantages.
zh: 我们的计划有很多优点。

en: Our plan has many additional advantages.
zh: 我们的计划还有许多额外的优点。

en: Completely surrounded by our troops, the enemy finally surrendered to us.
zh: 敌人被我们的军队完全包围，最终向我们投降了。

en: It's you who has broken our agreement.
zh: 是你破坏了我们的协议。

en: Our ultimate goal is to establish world peace.
zh: 我们的最终目标是建立世界和平。

en: Our holiday plans are still in the air.
zh: 我们的度假计划尚未确定。

en: The very air we breathe is polluted with smog from the factory chimneys.
zh: 我们呼吸的空气都被工厂烟囱排放的烟雾污染了。

en: It's clear that our arguments don't overlap at all.
zh: 很明显，我们的观点没有任何交集。

en: Our interest converges on that point.
zh: 我们的利益在那一点上趋于一致。

en: Relations between us seem to be on the ebb.
zh: 我们之间的关系似乎在衰退。

en: From our point of view, his proposal is reasonable.
zh: 从我们的角度来看，他的提议是合理的。

en: Our school is very close to the park.
zh: 我们的学校离公园很近。

en: Our school prohibits us from going to the movies alone.
zh: 我们学校禁止我们独自去看电影。

en: We will adopt your method at our school.
zh: 我们将在我们学校采用你的方法。

en: Our diplomacy and strategy ran in clear contradiction to each other.
zh: 我们的外交和战略明显相互矛盾。

en: In our interpretation, the output data in Table 2 is an acceptable variation of that in Table 1.
zh: 根据我们的理解，表2中的输出数据是表1中数据的可接受的变体。

en: Our company needs someone who is at home in advanced technology.
zh: 我们公司需要精通先进技术的人才。

en: Our company failed to survive against cutthroat competition.
zh: 我们公司在激烈的竞争中未能生存下来。

en: Our company makes use of the Internet.
zh: 我们公司利用互联网。

en: It took quite a while to sort out all our luggage.
zh: 整理我们所有的行李花了不少时间。

en: Our earnings are in proportion to our real ability.
zh: 我们的收入与我们的实际能力成正比。

en: Compared to our house, his is a palace.
zh: 和我们的房子相比，他的房子简直是宫殿。

en: It is very hard to get rid of cockroaches from our house.
zh: 要清除我们家里的蟑螂非常困难。

en: Our yacht club has ten members.
zh: 我们的游艇俱乐部有十名成员。

en: Our meeting rarely starts on time.
zh: 我们的会议很少准时开始。

en: Since neither one of us could afford to take the other to the movies, we went Dutch.
zh: 因为我们俩都负担不起请对方去看电影，所以我们AA制。

en: Our country's climate is temperate.
zh: 我们国家的气候是温带气候。

en: Our team is winning.
zh: 我们的队伍正在获胜。

en: Our team were wearing red shirts.
zh: 我们的队伍穿着红色衬衫。

en: Our team competed with a powerful rival.
zh: 我们的队伍与一个强大的对手竞争。

en: Our team won the game.
zh: 我们的队伍赢得了比赛。

en: Our team is five points ahead.
zh: 我们的队伍领先五分。

en: We won the game by three goals to one.
zh: 我们以三比一赢得了比赛。

en: Our team can easily beat your team in the first game.
zh: 我们的队伍在第一场比赛中可以轻松击败你们的队伍。

en: It was apparent to everybody that our team was stronger.
zh: 每个人都清楚地看到我们的队伍更强大。

en: Our team is gaining ground.
zh: 我们的队伍正在取得进展。

en: Our team has the game on ice.
zh: 我们的队伍胜券在握。

en: Our team is two points ahead.
zh: 我们的队伍领先两分。

en: Our staff is eager to help you.
zh: 我们的员工渴望为您提供帮助。

en: Our soccer team beat all the other teams in the town.
zh: 我们的足球队击败了镇上所有其他球队。

en: Initially we had some problems with our computer system, but they've been sorted out now.
zh: 最初我们的计算机系统出现了一些问题，但现在已经解决了。

en: We are not short of oil in this country.
zh: 我们国家不缺石油。

en: Our club is affiliated with an international organization.
zh: 我们的俱乐部隶属于一个国际组织。

en: Our class has increased in size.
zh: 我们班级的人数增加了。

en: More than one student studies French in our class.
zh: 我们班里不止一个学生学习法语。

en: No other boy in our class is more studious than Jack.
zh: 我们班里没有哪个男孩比杰克更用功。

en: When our class performed a play, I took charge of stage effects.
zh: 我们班级演出戏剧时，我负责舞台效果。

en: Our bodies respond to our feelings.
zh: 我们的身体会对我们的感觉做出反应。

en: All our efforts were without result.
zh: 我们所有的努力都毫无结果。

en: Give us the tools, and we will finish the job.
zh: 给我们工具，我们就会完成这项工作。

en: Some members agree with us, some don't, and others haven't expressed their opinions.
zh: 一些成员同意我们的观点，一些不同意，还有一些没有表达他们的意见。

en: Famine stared us in the face.
zh: 饥荒迫在眉睫。

en: All we need now is action, not discussion.
zh: 我们现在需要的是行动，而不是讨论。

en: The God who gave us life, gave us liberty at the same time.
zh: 赐予我们生命的上帝，同时也赐予了我们自由。

en: We have a rich historical heritage.
zh: 我们拥有丰富的历史遗产。

en: We need some formal instruction in literature.
zh: 我们需要一些正规的文学指导。

en: We had no alternative but to fight.
zh: 我们别无选择，只能战斗。

en: We have the alternative of death and submission.
zh: 我们有死亡和屈服这两个选择。

en: Nothing bars our way.
zh: 没有什么能阻挡我们的道路。

en: We had an implicit agreement that we would support each other.
zh: 我们有一个默契的协议，我们会互相支持。

en: We had a slight difference of opinion.
zh: 我们之间有一点意见分歧。

en: It is not necessary for us to attend the meeting.
zh: 我们没有必要参加会议。

en: Stay here with us.
zh: 和我们待在这里。

en: Let us do the work.
zh: 让我们来做这项工作。

en: We Germans fear God, but nothing else in the world.
zh: 我们德国人敬畏上帝，但除此之外，什么都不怕。

en: We're getting nowhere with those problems.
zh: 我们在解决这些问题上毫无进展。

en: Our departure tomorrow is contingent on fair weather.
zh: 我们明天的出发取决于天气是否晴朗。

en: To our great surprise, she held her breath for three minutes.
zh: 令我们非常惊讶的是，她屏住了呼吸三分钟。

en: It is difficult for us to persuade him.
zh: 我们很难说服他。

en: We were unable to make contact with them until it was too late.
zh: 直到为时已晚，我们才能够与他们取得联系。

en: The church we went past crumbled five minutes afterwards due to a huge earthquake and more than a 100 churchgoers were buried alive.
zh: 我们路过的那座教堂，五分钟后因一场巨大的地震而倒塌，一百多名做礼拜的人被活埋。

en: It is good for us to understand other cultures.
zh: 了解其他文化对我们有好处。

en: It will be little more than a hundred years before we use all the oil up.
zh: 再过一百多年，我们就会用完所有的石油。

en: We were having a quiet supper when out of the blue my mother announced she was going back to school.
zh: 我们正在安静地吃晚饭，突然我妈妈宣布她要重返学校。

en: Heat and light are necessary for our existence.
zh: 热和光对我们的生存是必要的。

en: It is up to you whether we can succeed or not.
zh: 我们能否成功取决于你。

en: We have only a slender chance of success.
zh: 我们只有一线成功的希望。

en: We know the truth, not only by reason, but also at heart.
zh: 我们知道真相，不仅通过理性，也通过内心。

en: I hope the weather clears up before we have to leave.
zh: 我希望在我们离开之前天气能好转。

en: Our meeting was just an accident.
zh: 我们的相遇只是一个意外。

en: It was just an accident that we met.
zh: 我们相遇只是一个意外。

en: If we hang tight, I'm sure we can make it through these bad times.
zh: 如果我们坚持下去，我相信我们能度过这些艰难的时期。

en: We may well take pride in our old temples.
zh: 我们完全可以为我们的古老寺庙感到自豪。

en: What if we should fail?
zh: 如果我们失败了怎么办？

en: As we went around the corner, the lake came into view.
zh: 当我们转过拐角时，湖泊映入眼帘。

en: We naturally got excited.
zh: 我们自然而然地感到兴奋。

en: Our train had already pulled out when we arrived at the station.
zh: 当我们到达车站时，我们的火车已经开走了。

en: The day will soon come when we will conquer space and travel to the moon.
zh: 我们征服太空并前往月球的那一天很快就会到来。

en: We are the first to arrive.
zh: 我们是第一批到达的人。

en: Let us stop to think how much we depend upon atomic energy.
zh: 让我们停下来想想我们有多依赖原子能。

en: To our great disappointment, the game was called off.
zh: 令我们非常失望的是，比赛被取消了。

en: It will be very important whether we win the battle or not.
zh: 我们是否赢得这场战斗将非常重要。

en: We found it impossible for us to cross the river.
zh: 我们发现我们不可能过河。

en: We actually didn't see the accident.
zh: 我们实际上没有看到事故。

en: There's no need for us to argue about this.
zh: 我们没有必要为这件事争论。

en: It takes us thirty minutes to walk from here to the station.
zh: 我们从这里走到车站需要三十分钟。

en: It is not important whether we win the game or not.
zh: 我们是否赢得比赛并不重要。

en: It is important whether we win the game or not.
zh: 我们是否赢得比赛很重要。

en: To our disappointment, our team lost the game.
zh: 令我们失望的是，我们的球队输了比赛。

en: We own a few hundred acres between the three of us.
zh: 我们三个人总共拥有几百英亩土地。

en: I'm the witchfinder general.
zh: 我是猎巫将军。

en: Our travel advice center caters to the independent traveler.
zh: 我们的旅行咨询中心为独立旅行者提供服务。

en: My name is Hopkins.
zh: 我叫霍普金斯。

en: The leader of our party met with the other leaders and talked about the problem.
zh: 我们党的领导人与其他领导人会面并讨论了这个问题。

en: Our party finally had a candidate we could put forward with pride.
zh: 我们党终于有了一个我们可以自豪地推举的候选人。

en: Our company is going to be left behind too if we don't create an environment in which we can get instant Internet access.
zh: 如果我们不创造一个可以即时访问互联网的环境，我们的公司也会被抛在后面。

en: Our company had the fortieth anniversary of its foundation.
zh: 我们公司迎来了成立四十周年纪念日。

en: We export various kinds of computers all over the globe.
zh: 我们向全球出口各种电脑。

en: This is an extremely well run company.
zh: 这是一家管理得非常好的公司。

en: Our company decided on flat rate pricing.
zh: 我们公司决定采用统一价格。

en: Our company has a long, long history.
zh: 我们公司有着悠久的历史。

en: We do business with that company.
zh: 我们和那家公司有业务往来。

en: We're thoroughly prepared for the millennium bug.
zh: 我们为千年虫做好了充分的准备。

en: The future of our company is at stake. We have been heavily in the red for the last couple of years.
zh: 我们公司的未来岌岌可危。过去几年我们一直严重亏损。

en: Our company's base is in Tokyo.
zh: 我们公司的总部设在东京。

en: Our sales campaign is successful in a big way.
zh: 我们的销售活动非常成功。

en: This new product of ours is a serious blow to our rival company.
zh: 我们的这款新产品对竞争对手公司是一个沉重的打击。

en: Skim through this pamphlet before you take the examination for our company.
zh: 在参加我们公司的考试之前，请浏览一下这本小册子。

en: Our company's agent in Rio will meet you at the airport.
zh: 我们公司在里约的代理人会在机场接您。

en: Our company has many clients from abroad.
zh: 我们公司有很多来自国外的客户。

en: Our showroom made a hit with young ladies.
zh: 我们的展示厅深受年轻女性的欢迎。

en: You have, no doubt, heard of our company.
zh: 毫无疑问，您听说过我们公司。

en: Parents who beat their children really make my blood boil.
zh: 虐待孩子的父母真让我怒火中烧。

en: Our country must develop its natural resources.
zh: 我们国家必须开发自然资源。

en: We have to defend our country from the foreign aggression.
zh: 我们必须保卫我们的国家免受外国侵略。

en: We must promote commerce with neighboring countries.
zh: 我们必须促进与邻国的贸易。

en: We import coffee from Brazil.
zh: 我们从巴西进口咖啡。

en: The youth of our country is indifferent to politics.
zh: 我们国家的年轻人对政治漠不关心。

en: Our trading companies do business all over the world.
zh: 我们的贸易公司在世界各地开展业务。

en: The pollution of our coasts is very serious.
zh: 我们海岸的污染非常严重。

en: Our school adopted his teaching methods.
zh: 我们学校采用了他的教学方法。

en: Our school has adopted a new teaching method.
zh: 我们学校采用了一种新的教学方法。

en: Our army broke through the enemy defenses.
zh: 我军突破了敌人的防线。

en: Our troops were constantly harassed by the guerrillas.
zh: 我们的部队不断受到游击队的骚扰。

en: There is no man but loves his home.
zh: 没有人不爱自己的家。

en: Our army took the kingdom by surprise.
zh: 我军出其不意地占领了那个王国。

en: There is nothing like home.
zh: 没有什么比得上家。

en: Our house is conveniently located.
zh: 我们的房子位置很方便。

en: My house needs major repairs.
zh: 我的房子需要大修。

en: The house isn't huge and it's on about two-thirds of an acre, and when we first bought it I spent several hours every week getting the lawnmower fixed and cutting the lawn, in that order.
zh: 房子不算大，占地大约三分之二英亩，我们刚买下它的时候，我每周都要花好几个小时先修理割草机，然后再割草。

en: We are expecting an addition to our family.
zh: 我们家要添丁了。

en: There is a kitchen garden behind my house.
zh: 我家后面有一个菜园。

en: My garden is filled with sweet-smelling blooms.
zh: 我的花园里开满了散发着香味的花朵。

en: There is a small garden in front of my house.
zh: 我家门前有一个小花园。

en: Our family budget is in the red.
zh: 我们家的预算超支了。

en: If only we had a garden!
zh: 要是我们有个花园就好了！

en: At home we subscribe to the Asahi Shimbun.
zh: 我们家订了《朝日新闻》。

en: My wife holds the purse strings in our family.
zh: 我们家由我妻子掌管财政大权。

en: We substitute margarine for butter.
zh: 我们用人造黄油代替黄油。

en: We decorated the Christmas tree with lights.
zh: 我们用彩灯装饰圣诞树。

en: We keep a collie as a pet.
zh: 我们养了一只柯利牧羊犬当宠物。

en: Our team came home in triumph.
zh: 我们队凯旋而归。

en: Our team lost all its games.
zh: 我们队输掉了所有的比赛。

en: Our team lost the first game.
zh: 我们队输掉了第一场比赛。

en: Our team beat the Lions 3 to 0.
zh: 我们队以3比0击败了雄狮队。

en: We are happy to have you join our team.
zh: 我们很高兴你能加入我们的团队。

en: We are excited about having you on our team.
zh: 我们很高兴有你加入我们的团队。

en: Tom bats cleanup on our team.
zh: 汤姆是我们队的第四棒。

en: Can you account for why our team lost?
zh: 你能解释一下我们队为什么输了吗？

en: We welcome those who want to join our club.
zh: 我们欢迎那些想加入我们俱乐部的人。

en: The mere sight of a snake makes her sick.
zh: 仅仅看到蛇就让她感到恶心。

en: A swarm of mosquitoes followed him.
zh: 一群蚊子跟着他。

en: I got a lot of mosquito bites.
zh: 我被蚊子咬了很多包。

en: Don't scratch your mosquito bite. It'll get inflamed.
zh: 不要挠蚊子咬的包。它会发炎的。

en: They say that he hates to study.
zh: 他们说他讨厌学习。

en: A mosquito just bit me.
zh: 一只蚊子刚咬了我。

en: What with overwork and poor meals, she fell ill.
zh: 由于过度劳累和饮食不良，她病倒了。

en: What with overwork and lack of nourishment, he became very ill.
zh: 由于过度劳累和营养不良，他病得很重。

en: What with fatigue and lack of sleep, he has fallen ill at last.
zh: 由于疲劳和缺乏睡眠，他终于病倒了。

en: What with overwork and lack of sleep, she has lost her health.
zh: 由于过度劳累和缺乏睡眠，她失去了健康。

en: Fatigue is the natural result of overwork.
zh: 疲劳是过度劳累的自然结果。

en: His health has broken down because of overwork.
zh: 他的健康因为过度劳累而垮掉了。

en: Her eyes have sunk through overwork.
zh: 她的眼睛因为过度劳累而凹陷了。

en: The strain has begun to tell on his health.
zh: 压力开始影响他的健康。

en: Excessive indulgence spoiled the child.
zh: 过度的溺爱宠坏了孩子。

en: The word 'excessive competition' is frequently used in Japanese industry, but there is not a precise definition of the practice.
zh: “过度竞争”这个词在日本工业中经常使用，但对这种做法没有明确的定义。

en: Eating too much fat is supposed to cause heart disease.
zh: 据说吃太多脂肪会导致心脏病。

en: Excessive supply leads to a drop in prices.
zh: 过度供应导致价格下跌。

en: Too much exercise does more harm than good.
zh: 过多的运动弊大于利。

en: The doctor advised me to leave off jogging because it was excessive exercise.
zh: 医生建议我停止慢跑，因为那是过度运动。

en: Too much drinking may be hazardous to your health.
zh: 过度饮酒可能对你的健康有害。

en: I feel terrible about my mistake.
zh: 我对我的错误感到非常难过。

en: We have experienced many changes over the last decade.
zh: 在过去的十年里，我们经历了许多变化。

en: In a past-oriented society, people dwell on the past and on tradition.
zh: 在一个以过去为导向的社会里，人们沉湎于过去和传统。

en: We can record the past and present.
zh: 我们可以记录过去和现在。

en: It is considered impossible to travel back to the past.
zh: 人们认为不可能回到过去。

en: We can know the past, but the future we can only feel.
zh: 我们可以了解过去，但未来我们只能感受。

en: Don't dwell on your past mistakes!
zh: 不要沉溺于过去的错误！

en: Don't dwell on your past failures.
zh: 不要沉溺于过去的失败。

en: Don't grieve about your past errors.
zh: 不要为过去的错误而悲伤。

en: My past indiscretions are coming back to haunt me.
zh: 我过去的轻率行为正在回来困扰我。

en: Stop clinging to your glory days, or you'll be left behind.
zh: 不要再沉迷于你过去的辉煌了，否则你会落后的。

en: Don't worry about the past.
zh: 不要担心过去。

en: One day I strolled into the woods.
zh: 有一天我漫步走进树林。

en: Have you ever had any serious illness?
zh: 你有没有得过什么大病？

en: In the past, Fletcher Fuel was approached by Japanese companies.
zh: 过去，弗莱彻燃料公司曾与日本公司接触过。

en: You must live in the present, not in the past.
zh: 你必须活在当下，而不是过去。

en: Women had little choice in the past.
zh: 过去，女性几乎没有选择。

en: In the past, the old used to be looked upon as experts in solving various problems of life.
zh: 过去，老年人被认为是解决各种生活问题的专家。

en: Our policy is to build for the future, not the past.
zh: 我们的政策是为未来建设，而不是过去。

en: Although CFIT accounted for just over a third of crashes in the past six years, it caused 53% of the deaths.
zh: 虽然过去六年里，可控飞行撞地事故仅占坠机事故的三分之一多一点，但却造成了53%的死亡。

en: We haven't had a price increase in the last five years.
zh: 在过去的五年里，我们没有涨过价。

en: Prices have risen by 50 percent during the past ten years.
zh: 在过去的十年里，价格上涨了百分之五十。

en: It's never too late to make amends.
zh: 亡羊补牢，为时未晚。

en: He who makes no mistakes makes nothing.
zh: 不犯错误的人什么也做不成。

en: In days gone by, things were different.
zh: 在过去的日子里，情况不一样。

en: It is no use crying over spilt milk.
zh: 覆水难收，后悔无用。

en: Never too much of anything.
zh: 任何东西都不嫌多。

en: Don't look back on your past.
zh: 不要回顾你的过去。

en: Too much water drowned the miller.
zh: 水多了淹死磨坊主。

en: Money circulates through the banking system.
zh: 资金在银行系统内流通。

en: It is without justification that money has been called one of the greatest inventions of man.
zh: 把钱称为人类最伟大的发明之一是没有道理的。

en: After some freight cars were derailed, services were suspended on the Chuo Line.
zh: 一些货车脱轨后，中央线的服务暂停了。

en: The section chief made me work like a slave.
zh: 科长让我像奴隶一样工作。

en: I heard the manager's wife is on vacation. And, well, when the cat's away, the mice play. Now he's out partying every night.
zh: 我听说经理的妻子在度假。 哎，山中无老虎，猴子称大王。 现在他每天晚上都出去聚会。

en: As soon as our manager got off our backs, everything started to go off without a hitch.
zh: 我们的经理一放松，一切都开始顺利进行。

en: The scores are low because the task is cognitively demanding.
zh: 分数很低，因为这项任务在认知上要求很高。

en: Opinions are divided on the issue of taxes.
zh: 对于税收问题，意见不一。

en: Do you have anything to declare?
zh: 你有什么要申报的吗？

en: It is often said that sweets are bad for your teeth.
zh: 人们常说甜食对牙齿不好。

en: You cannot have your cake and eat it, too.
zh: 鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

en: Could I check my bags?
zh: 我可以寄存我的行李吗？

en: I hope this makes it through baggage inspection.
zh: 我希望这能通过行李检查。

en: Would you keep this baggage, please?
zh: 请您保管这个行李好吗？

en: Make room for the baggage.
zh: 给行李腾出地方。

en: Would you carry my luggage upstairs?
zh: 你能帮我把行李搬到楼上吗？

en: May I leave my belongings on the bus?
zh: 我可以把我的东西留在公共汽车上吗？

en: I'd like to put my belongings away.
zh: 我想把我的东西放好。

en: You don't have to carry your baggage.
zh: 你不必携带你的行李。

en: Could you carry my bags for me?
zh: 你能帮我拿一下行李吗？

en: Please put your baggage on this scale.
zh: 请把你的行李放在这个秤上。

en: Let me help you with your baggage.
zh: 我来帮你拿行李吧。

en: Has the shipment arrived yet?
zh: 货运到了吗？

en: Send your baggage in advance.
zh: 请提前托运行李。

en: The load was too heavy for a driver to carry alone.
zh: 这批货物太重了，司机一个人搬不动。

en: How many bags do you have?
zh: 你有几个包？

en: Where should I put my baggage?
zh: 我应该把行李放在哪里？

en: Where can I get my baggage?
zh: 我在哪里可以取到我的行李？

en: I have three pieces of baggage.
zh: 我有三件行李。

en: Will you look after my baggage?
zh: 你能帮我照看行李吗？

en: Attach this label to your package.
zh: 把这个标签贴在你的包裹上。

en: In case the shipment is delayed, we have special delay insurance.
zh: 如果货物延误，我们有专门的延误保险。

en: There is nothing left to do aside from packing.
zh: 除了打包，没什么可做的了。

en: The label is attached to the trunk.
zh: 标签贴在行李箱上了。

en: Have you finished packing yet?
zh: 你打包好了吗？

en: Company A is trying to play us off against Company B in a severe price-war.
zh: A公司正试图利用我们与B公司进行激烈的价格战。

en: I have an allergy to pollen.
zh: 我对花粉过敏。

en: Hold the vase in both hands.
zh: 用双手捧住花瓶。

en: I filled a vase with water.
zh: 我往花瓶里装满了水。

en: I must apologize to you for breaking the vase.
zh: 我必须为打碎花瓶向您道歉。

en: The vase burst into fragments.
zh: 花瓶碎成了碎片。

en: The vase fell to the floor and shattered.
zh: 花瓶掉在地上摔碎了。

en: The vase fell from the table and crashed to pieces.
zh: 花瓶从桌子上掉下来摔成了碎片。

en: The flowers in the vase are roses.
zh: 花瓶里的花是玫瑰。

en: How many flowers are there in the vase?
zh: 花瓶里有多少朵花？

en: I see a rare flower in the vase.
zh: 我看到花瓶里有一朵稀有的花。

en: There are some beautiful roses in the vase.
zh: 花瓶里有一些美丽的玫瑰。

en: The vase was broken to pieces.
zh: 花瓶摔成了碎片。

en: The vase crashed to pieces.
zh: 花瓶摔得粉碎。

en: The roses in the garden smell sweet.
zh: 花园里的玫瑰花闻起来很香。

en: The tulips are in bloom in the flower bed.
zh: 花坛里的郁金香正在盛开。

en: Hanako called his bluff.
zh: 花子识破了他的虚张声势。

en: Hanako made the final payment on her car, and felt very satisfied.
zh: 花子付清了汽车的尾款，感到非常满意。

en: It was clear that Hanako did not wish to marry Taro.
zh: 很明显，花子不想嫁给太郎。

en: Hanako has forgotten her umbrella again.
zh: 花子又忘了带伞。

en: Hanako is set on going to Paris.
zh: 花子铁了心要去巴黎。

en: Hanako likes cake very much.
zh: 花子非常喜欢蛋糕。

en: Hanako grew taller than her mother.
zh: 花子长得比她妈妈还高了。

en: Hanako seems quiet, but she also get things done when it's necessary.
zh: 花子看起来很安静，但必要的时候她也能把事情做好。

en: Hanako has attended an American college for four years.
zh: 花子在美国的大学上了四年学。

en: Hanako came all the way from Hokkaido in order to see her father.
zh: 花子特地从北海道赶来见她的父亲。

en: Hanako turned out to be a surprisingly nice person.
zh: 花子原来是个出人意料的好人。

en: I can't wait for spring to come so we can sit under the cherry trees.

zh: 这个理论是建立在科学基础上的。

en: Scientific discoveries don't always make the world a better place.
zh: 科学发现并不总是让世界变得更美好。

en: Reading science fiction sometimes does much to encourage a scientific view of the universe.
zh: 阅读科幻小说有时对鼓励人们用科学的眼光看待宇宙大有帮助。

en: Scientists seem to have known the truth.
zh: 科学家们似乎已经知道了真相。

en: Scientists have been discovering new drugs, so there is always hope for the unconscious person.
zh: 科学家们一直在发现新药，所以对于无意识的人来说，总是有希望的。

en: Scientists can easily compute the distance between planets.
zh: 科学家们可以很容易地计算出行星之间的距离。

en: Scientists deal mainly with physical matters.
zh: 科学家主要研究物理问题。

en: Scientists have come up with many explanations for why the sky is blue.
zh: 对于天空为什么是蓝色的，科学家们提出了许多解释。

en: The scientist maintained that the theory should be tested through experiments.
zh: 那位科学家坚持认为该理论应该通过实验来验证。

en: The scientist insisted on proceeding with the research.
zh: 那位科学家坚持继续进行这项研究。

en: A scientist had to know how to ask the correct question and to state it so clearly that the answer would be, in effect, a definite yes or no, not "maybe".
zh: 一位科学家必须知道如何提出正确的问题，并且清楚地陈述它，以至于答案实际上是一个明确的“是”或“否”，而不是“可能”。

en: Some scientists predict that the world oil reserves will be used up within a century.
zh: 一些科学家预测，世界石油储量将在一个世纪内耗尽。

en: According to scientists, the atmosphere is getting warmer year after year.
zh: 根据科学家的说法，大气一年比一年变暖。

en: Scientists say many factors bring about changes in weather.
zh: 科学家说，许多因素导致了天气的变化。

en: I am determined to be a scientist.
zh: 我决心成为一名科学家。

en: Scientists will come up with new methods of increasing the world's food supply.
zh: 科学家们将会提出增加世界粮食供应的新方法。

en: Scientists regard the discovery as important.
zh: 科学家们认为这项发现很重要。

en: Scientists began to find answers to these questions.
zh: 科学家们开始找到这些问题的答案。

en: Scientists are working hard to put an end to AIDS.
zh: 科学家们正在努力结束艾滋病。

en: Scientists are fighting to stem the spread of the AIDS virus.
zh: 科学家们正在努力阻止艾滋病病毒的传播。

en: It is not good for a scientist to get emotional.
zh: 科学家过于情绪化是不好的。

en: As scientists keep insisting, there is neither good nor bad in any scientific discovery.
zh: 正如科学家们一直坚持认为的那样，任何科学发现本身都没有好坏之分。

en: Technology is in itself meaningless unless it serves mankind.
zh: 技术本身毫无意义，除非它为人类服务。

en: Technology has failed to ease the conflict between man and nature.
zh: 技术未能缓解人与自然之间的冲突。

en: Science and technology have come to pervade every aspect of our lives and, as a result, society is changing at a speed which is quite unprecedented.
zh: 科学技术已经渗透到我们生活的方方面面，因此，社会正以一种前所未有的速度发生变化。

en: Technology has differentiated our cultures.
zh: 技术已经使我们的文化产生了差异。

en: Technology has given us immense power.
zh: 技术赋予了我们巨大的力量。

en: Some people argue that technology has negative effects.
zh: 有些人认为技术有负面影响。

en: A revolution has occurred in technology.
zh: 技术领域发生了一场革命。

en: A great revolution has taken place in technology.
zh: 技术领域发生了一场伟大的革命。

en: I don't think that technology provides us with everything we need.
zh: 我不认为科技能提供我们所需的一切。

en: Science can be dangerous when applied carelessly.
zh: 当应用不当时，科学可能是危险的。

en: Science is based on very careful observations.
zh: 科学是建立在非常仔细的观察之上的。

en: Science has made remarkable progress.
zh: 科学已经取得了显著的进步。

en: Science is based on careful observation.
zh: 科学是建立在仔细观察的基础上的。

en: Science is far more than a collection of facts and methods.
zh: 科学远不止是一系列的事实和方法。

en: Science brought about many changes in our lives.
zh: 科学给我们的生活带来了许多变化。

en: Science has brought about many changes in our lives.
zh: 科学给我们的生活带来了许多变化。

en: Science has made rapid progress in this century.
zh: 科学在本世纪取得了快速的进步。

en: I do not like science.
zh: 我不喜欢科学。

en: Science rests upon observation.
zh: 科学建立在观察之上。

en: Science is a good thing, but it is not an end in itself; it is a means toward an end and that end is human betterment.
zh: 科学是件好事，但它本身不是目的；它是一种达到目的的手段，而那个目的是人类的改善。

en: Science is the way to prepare for the 21st century.
zh: 科学是为21世纪做准备的方式。

en: The aim of science is, as has often been said, to foresee, not to understand.
zh: 正如常说的那样，科学的目的是预见，而不是理解。

en: The primary aim of science is to find truth, new truth.
zh: 科学的主要目的是寻找真理，新的真理。

en: Advances in science don't always benefit humanity.
zh: 科学的进步并不总是对人类有益。

en: Advance in science is continuous.
zh: 科学的进步是持续不断的。

en: Progress in science was often barred by convention.
zh: 科学的进步常常受到传统的阻碍。

en: The progress of science has brought about great change in our lives.
zh: 科学的进步给我们的生活带来了巨大的变化。

en: In science class, we drew pictures of cells.
zh: 在科学课上，我们画了细胞的图片。

en: Science and art must contribute to the promotion of human welfare.
zh: 科学和艺术必须为促进人类福祉做出贡献。

en: Science as such is not interested in the value or worth of things.
zh: 科学本身对事物的价值或意义不感兴趣。

en: Science does not solve all the problems of life.
zh: 科学不能解决生活中的所有问题。

en: Science has not solved all the problems of life.
zh: 科学还没有解决生活中的所有问题。

en: If science makes progress, we'll be able to solve such problems.
zh: 如果科学取得进步，我们将能够解决这些问题。

en: As science makes progress, old ways give place to new.
zh: 随着科学的进步，旧的方式让位于新的方式。

en: Chemistry gave us plastics.
zh: 化学为我们带来了塑料。

en: When science was less important than it is now, it was all very well to leave science to the scientists.
zh: 当科学不如现在重要时，把科学留给科学家们处理当然很好。

en: Science produced the atomic bomb.
zh: 科学制造了原子弹。

en: Science builds our lifestyle.
zh: 科学塑造了我们的生活方式。

en: My uncle's brother's son got involved in a shady business and disgraced the family.
zh: 我叔叔的兄弟的儿子卷入了一桩不正当的生意，给家族蒙羞。

en: Sleep and wait for good luck.
zh: 睡觉并等待好运。

en: A canal flowed between two rows of houses.
zh: 一条运河在两排房屋之间流淌。

en: My wife will be glad to see you, too.
zh: 我妻子也会很高兴见到你的。

en: My wife is preparing dinner right now.
zh: 我妻子现在正在准备晚餐。

en: My wife often rings me up, while she travels abroad.
zh: 我妻子出国旅行时经常给我打电话。

en: My wife is partial to apple pie.
zh: 我妻子特别喜欢苹果派。

en: I'm sick of listening to her complaints.
zh: 我厌倦了听她的抱怨。

en: My wife's part-time job brings in a little extra money.
zh: 我妻子的兼职工作带来了一些额外的收入。

en: There is no place like home.
zh: 金窝银窝不如自己的草窝。

en: You'll find domestic articles on the third floor.
zh: 您会在三楼找到家居用品。

en: Home life was being screened from foreign eyes.
zh: 家庭生活被屏蔽在外国人的视线之外。

en: My tutor scolded me for my stupid behavior.
zh: 我的导师因为我的愚蠢行为而责骂我。

en: The spirit of patriotism has its source in the love of the family.
zh: 爱国主义精神源于对家庭的爱。

en: I have peace at home.
zh: 我在家很安心。

en: Are you happy in your house?
zh: 你住在你的房子里幸福吗？

en: A lot of problems derive from a lack of reading in the home.
zh: 很多问题源于家庭中缺乏阅读。

en: We tend to use more and more electric appliances in the home.
zh: 我们倾向于在家里使用越来越多的电器。

en: Unable to pay the rent, I asked him for assistance.
zh: 由于无法支付租金，我向他寻求帮助。

en: The rent is due tomorrow.
zh: 租金明天到期。

en: How much is the rent per month?
zh: 一个月租金多少钱？

en: How much is the monthly rate?
zh: 月租多少钱？

en: Our rent is four times as much as it was ten years ago.
zh: 我们的房租是十年前的四倍。

en: You're a month behind with your rent.
zh: 你欠了一个月的房租。

en: Regarding the matter of house-rent, I have come to terms with him.
zh: 关于房租的事，我已经和他达成协议了。

en: The dog had the liberty of the entire house.
zh: 那条狗可以在整个房子里自由活动。

en: I rear cattle.
zh: 我饲养牛。

en: The cattle starved to death.
zh: 那些牛饿死了。

en: Their cattle are all fat.
zh: 他们的牛都很肥壮。

en: The whole house was ill in bed.
zh: 全家都卧病在床。

en: All the family set off on the trip.
zh: 全家人都出发去旅行了。

en: It made my mother's day when all the family gathered and had a party.
zh: 全家人聚在一起开派对，让我妈妈非常高兴。

en: His whole family is like that. They're like peas in a pod.
zh: 他们全家都那样，简直是一个模子里刻出来的。

en: All my family is very well.
zh: 我全家人都很好。

en: His whole family is like that.
zh: 他们全家都那样。

en: Supporting his family was a great burden for him.
zh: 供养家庭对他来说是个沉重的负担。

en: He has to work hard so as to support his family.
zh: 他必须努力工作来养家糊口。

en: May I bring my family along?
zh: 我可以带我的家人一起去吗？

en: All the family got out of the car.
zh: 全家人都下了车。

en: We're practically family.
zh: 我们简直就像一家人一样。

en: My family are all well.
zh: 我的家人都很好。

en: A family is the smallest unit of society.
zh: 家庭是社会最小的单位。

en: The family is the most important unit in society.
zh: 家庭是社会最重要的单位。

en: The family is the basic unit of society.
zh: 家庭是社会的基本单位。

en: The family were all out reaping the corn.
zh: 全家人都出去收割玉米了。

en: The family assimilated quickly into their new environment.
zh: 这个家庭很快适应了新的环境。

en: We are a family of four.
zh: 我们是四口之家。

en: Family members should not compete against each other.
zh: 家人之间不应该互相竞争。

en: May I take a few days off to visit my family?
zh: 我可以请几天假去探望我的家人吗？

en: How is your family?
zh: 你家里人好吗？

en: Please give my best to the entire family.
zh: 请代我向你的全家致以最诚挚的问候。

en: He was happy in the bosom of his family.
zh: 他在家庭的温暖怀抱中感到幸福。

en: The members of the family nursed the patient by turns.
zh: 家里人轮流照顾病人。

en: May you and your family be happy.
zh: 祝你和你的家人幸福。

en: I feel homesick when I remember my family.
zh: 当我想到我的家人时，我感到想家。

en: I'd like to call my family.
zh: 我想给家里打个电话。

en: May I ask about your family?
zh: 我可以问问你的家人吗？

en: They have time to spend with their families or to enjoy their hobbies.
zh: 他们有时间和家人在一起或享受他们的爱好。

en: My family will be away for a week.
zh: 我的家人要离开一个星期。

en: I've always wanted to go to Australia with my family.
zh: 我一直想和我的家人一起去澳大利亚。

en: I had a hand in the family deciding to move to New York.
zh: 我家决定搬到纽约，我也出了一份力。

en: It's great to have a family.
zh: 拥有一个家庭真好。

en: If it were not for my family, I would give up this job.
zh: 如果不是为了我的家人，我早就放弃这份工作了。

en: The landlord told him to leave because he hadn't paid his rent.
zh: 房东因为他没交房租，让他搬走。

en: The landlord won't permit him to paint the door red.
zh: 房东不允许他把门漆成红色。

en: The landlord told me a cock and bull story about why we didn't have heat for three days.
zh: 房东告诉我一个荒诞的故事，说为什么我们三天没有暖气。

en: If we pay the rent to the landlady, we won't have any money for food; we are between the devil and the deep blue sea.
zh: 如果我们把房租交给女房东，我们就没钱买食物了；我们真是进退两难。

en: More and more married couples share household chores.
zh: 越来越多的夫妇分担家务。

en: I had to do all the housework, but I wish I had gone to the movies or shopping.
zh: 我不得不做所有的家务，但我真希望我去看电影或购物了。

en: It's easier for me to have a job than to do housework.
zh: 对我来说，找一份工作比做家务更容易。

en: Having finished all her housework, she sat down on the sofa to watch television.
zh: 做完所有家务后，她坐在沙发上看电视。

en: Lots of women both run a home and go out to work.
zh: 很多女性既要操持家务，又要外出工作。

en: I got him to help me when I moved the furniture.
zh: 搬家具的时候，我让他帮我。

en: The furniture was dusty.
zh: 家具很脏，都是灰尘。

en: All the furniture was covered with dust.
zh: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

en: Some furniture is put together with glue.
zh: 有些家具是用胶水粘合起来的。

en: The houses stand near to each other.
zh: 这些房子彼此相邻。

en: The fronts of the houses were hung with flags.
zh: 房子的正面挂满了旗帜。

en: The houses looked like so many matchboxes.
zh: 这些房子看起来像许多火柴盒。

en: There are a lot of persons who try to buy a house.
zh: 很多人都想买房子。

en: There are a great many people trying buy houses.
zh: 很多人都想买房子。

en: I mortgaged my house.
zh: 我抵押了我的房子。

en: We'll borrow some money on the house.
zh: 我们将以房子作抵押借一些钱。

en: I'm getting a new house built.
zh: 我正在盖一栋新房子。

en: Don't forget to turn off the gas before you leave the house.
zh: 离开房子前，别忘了关掉煤气。

en: Before you leave home, make sure your pets have enough food.
zh: 离家前，确保你的宠物有足够的食物。

en: The weather was lovely when I left home.
zh: 我离开家的时候天气很好。

en: I had no sooner left the house than it began to rain hard.
zh: 我刚离开家就开始下大雨。

en: I had hardly left home when it began raining.
zh: 我刚离开家就开始下雨。

en: As soon as I left home, it began to rain.
zh: 我一离开家就开始下雨。

en: I was leaving home when Tom telephoned me.
zh: 我正要离开家的时候，汤姆给我打了电话。

en: I had hardly left home when it began to rain heavily.
zh: 我刚离开家就开始下大雨。

en: As soon as I left home, I came across her in the street.
zh: 我一离开家，就在街上碰到了她。

en: As soon as I left home, I ran into her.
zh: 我一离开家就碰到了她。

en: As I left the house, I remembered the key.
zh: 我离开房子的时候，想起了钥匙。

en: We have made numerous improvements to our house since we bought it.
zh: 自从我们买了房子，我们已经对房子做了很多改进。

en: It took them two years to build the house.
zh: 他们花了两年时间才盖好这栋房子。

en: I will take you home.
zh: 我送你回家。

en: I want you to refurbish the house.
zh: 我想让你重新装修这房子。

en: Could you please drive me home?
zh: 你能送我回家吗？

en: I'll drive you home.
zh: 我送你回家。

en: Shall I drive you home?
zh: 要我送你回家吗？

en: It is no inconvenience to drive you home.
zh: 送你回家一点也不麻烦。

en: Let us go home.
zh: 我们回家吧。

en: On my way home, I came across an old friend.
zh: 在回家的路上，我偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

en: As soon as he got home, he began to play a computer game.
zh: 他一到家，就开始玩电脑游戏。

en: Both buildings burned down.
zh: 两栋建筑物都被烧毁了。

en: The telephone was ringing when I got home.
zh: 我到家的时候，电话铃响了。

en: It was not until I got home that I missed my watch.
zh: 直到我回到家，我才发现我的手表不见了。

en: The house collapsed in an earthquake.
zh: 房子在地震中倒塌了。

en: The house was burned to the ground.
zh: 房子被烧成平地。

en: The houses caught fire one after another.
zh: 这些房子一个接一个地着火了。

en: Each house is within shouting distance of another.
zh: 每栋房子都在彼此的呼喊距离之内。

en: A house is built on top of a solid foundation of cement.
zh: 房子建在坚固的水泥基础上。

en: The house was in flames.
zh: 房子着火了。

en: My house was on fire.
zh: 我的房子着火了。

en: We have two cats; one is white, and the other is black.
zh: 我们有两只猫；一只白色的，另一只黑色的。

en: The house burned down completely.
zh: 房子完全烧毁了。

en: The house looked good; moreover, the price was right.
zh: 房子看起来不错；而且，价格也很合适。

en: My backyard can hold more than ten people.
zh: 我的后院可以容纳十多个人。

en: The homeless sought shelter from a shower.
zh: 无家可归的人们为了躲避阵雨寻找避 shelter 所。

en: I spent the holidays decorating the house.
zh: 我花了很多时间装饰房子来度过假期。

en: There are scarcely any flowers in our garden.
zh: 我们的花园里几乎没有花。

en: Let me show you around our house.
zh: 让我带你参观一下我们的房子。

en: We are not cold in the house.
zh: 我们在屋里不冷。

en: All was silent in the house.
zh: 屋里一片寂静。

en: Every door in the house is locked.
zh: 房子里的每扇门都锁着。

en: I think the only problem I have now is being shut in at home.
zh: 我想我现在唯一的烦恼就是被关在家里。

en: There wasn't anybody in the house.
zh: 房子里空无一人。

en: When we have a family argument, my husband always sides with his mother instead of me.
zh: 当我们发生家庭争吵时，我丈夫总是站在他妈妈那边而不是我这边。

en: Let's take a rest in the garden instead of indoors.
zh: 我们去花园里休息一下，不要待在室内。

en: You can't have lost your coat in the house.
zh: 你的外套不可能丢在房子里。

en: The basements of the houses are likely to have problems.
zh: 房子的地下室很可能会有问题。

en: A horse passed my house.
zh: 一匹马经过我的房子。

en: My son can count up to a hundred now.
zh: 我儿子现在可以数到一百了。

en: There is a garden in front of the house.
zh: 房子前面有一个花园。

en: A number of cars are parked in front of my house.
zh: 我家门前停着几辆车。

en: There was a traffic accident in front of the house yesterday.
zh: 昨天房子前面发生了一起交通事故。

en: I made my whole family leave home.
zh: 我让我全家都离开了家。

en: She regretted deeply when she looked back on her life.
zh: 当她回顾自己的一生时，她深感后悔。

en: A fence runs around the house.
zh: 房子周围有一道栅栏。

en: I had to help with the housework.
zh: 我不得不帮忙做家务。

en: There is a fence about the house.
zh: 房子周围有一道栅栏。

en: The household was already awake at 6 in the morning.
zh: 早上六点，家里人已经醒了。

en: To make our house payments, we're going to have to tighten our belts.
zh: 为了支付我们的房款，我们必须勒紧裤腰带了。

en: There is a garden at the back of my house.
zh: 我家后面有一个花园。

en: After tying up loose ends on the house, the carpenter gave the painter approval to begin work.
zh: 木匠处理完房子的一些零碎工作后，批准油漆工开始工作。

en: There is a hut at the back of our house.
zh: 我们家后面有一个小屋。

en: Our dog buries its bones in the garden.
zh: 我们的狗把骨头埋在花园里。

en: Please wait outside of the house.
zh: 请在房子外面等候。

en: Our living room is sunny.
zh: 我们的客厅阳光明媚。

en: There are always some chores to be done about the house.
zh: 总有一些家务活要做。

en: Our family consists of five members.
zh: 我们家有五口人。

en: The rise in house prices enabled him to sell his house at a big profit.
zh: 房价上涨使他能够以高额利润出售他的房子。

en: The side of the house was covered with ivy.
zh: 房子的侧面覆盖着常春藤。

en: Please go around to the side of the house.
zh: 请绕到房子的侧面。

en: The homeless sought shelter from the chilly shower.
zh: 无家可归的人在寒冷的阵雨中寻找避难所。

en: The homeless people were annoyed by the flies and mosquitoes.
zh: 无家可归的人被苍蝇和蚊子困扰。

en: I was almost home when the car ran out of gas.
zh: 我快到家的时候，车没油了。

en: This side of the house catches the morning sun.
zh: 房子的这一面能照到早晨的阳光。

en: The oven in my house didn't run well today.
zh: 我家的烤箱今天不太好用。

en: There was a large garden behind the house.
zh: 房子后面有一个大花园。

en: She scraped her shoes clean before she entered the house.
zh: 她进屋前把鞋子刮干净。

en: It is our custom to take off our shoes when we enter the house.
zh: 我们有进屋脱鞋的习惯。

en: Can you deliver it to my house?
zh: 你能把它送到我家吗？

en: Investing money in your home has some merit; when it is time to sell it you can get more money.
zh: 把钱投资在你的房子里是有好处的；当要卖掉它的时候，你可以得到更多的钱。

en: On arriving home, he laid himself on the floor.
zh: 一到家，他就躺在地板上。

en: Scarcely had I reached home before the telephone rang.
zh: 我刚到家，电话就响了。

en: When I got home, I found your letter waiting for me.
zh: 我到家时，发现你的信在等我。

en: It was not until I reached home that I missed my purse.
zh: 直到我到家才发现我的钱包不见了。

en: It seemed strange that the door was open when I got home.
zh: 我到家的时候，门是开着的，这似乎很奇怪。

en: When I got home, I was very tired.
zh: 我到家的时候，非常累。

en: I'll give you a call when I get home.
zh: 我到家后会给你打电话。

en: When I got home, I was very hungry.
zh: 我到家的时候，非常饿。

en: I will give you a call as soon as I get home.
zh: 我一到家就给你打电话。

en: I had barely got home when the storm broke.
zh: 我刚到家，暴风雨就来了。

en: He had been repairing the car and looked tired when I arrived home.
zh: 我到家的时候，他一直在修车，看起来很累。

en: When I got home, I found I had lost my wallet.
zh: 我到家的时候，发现我的钱包丢了。

en: I've left my watch at home.
zh: 我把手表落在家里了。

en: On my way home, I met him.
zh: 我在回家的路上遇到了他。

en: I met a dog on my way home.
zh: 我在回家的路上遇到了一条狗。

en: Please remember to post the letter on your way home.
zh: 请记得在回家的路上把信寄了。

en: I did some shopping for Christmas on my way home.
zh: 我在回家的路上买了一些圣诞节的东西。

en: We're goin' home.
zh: 我们要回家了。

en: Please give me leave to go home.
zh: 请允许我回家。

en: Let me know when you'll return home.
zh: 你什么时候回家，告诉我一声。

en: On her way home, Mary came across John.
zh: 在回家的路上，玛丽碰巧遇到了约翰。

en: I did not miss my purse till I got home.
zh: 我到家后才发现我的钱包不见了。

en: I would rather sit reading in the library than go home.
zh: 我宁愿坐在图书馆里看书，也不愿回家。

en: I did not miss my purse until I returned home.
zh: 我直到回到家才发现我的钱包不见了。

en: I didn't miss my watch till I got home.
zh: 我到家后才发现我的手表不见了。

en: When I came home, my mother was standing by the door in tears.
zh: 我回到家的时候，我妈妈站在门口哭泣。

en: I leave to go home.
zh: 我告辞回家。

en: As soon as I got home, it began to rain.
zh: 我一到家，就开始下雨了。

en: I went home and ate a hearty breakfast.
zh: 我回家吃了一顿丰盛的早餐。

en: It wasn't until I got home that I missed my umbrella.
zh: 直到我回到家才发现我把伞弄丢了。

en: I was half asleep when I went home.
zh: 我回家的时候半睡半醒。

en: When I came home, I felt very hungry.
zh: 我回到家的时候，感觉非常饿。

en: My advice is for you to go home.
zh: 我的建议是让你回家。

en: A surprise was in store for me at home.
zh: 在家里有一个惊喜等着我。

en: We spent a lot of money on furnishing our house.
zh: 我们花了很多钱来装修我们的房子。

en: There are more children's stories about the fear of being left home alone.
zh: 有很多儿童故事是关于害怕独自留在家里的。

en: There was much food in the house.
zh: 房子里有很多食物。

en: We have two television sets.
zh: 我们有两台电视机。

en: There are 5 computers in the house, but 2 of them aren't any use.
zh: 家里有5台电脑，但其中2台没用。

en: He is away from home.
zh: 他不在家。

en: Entering the house, I tripped over the mat.
zh: 走进房子，我被垫子绊倒了。

en: The house was blazing with lights.
zh: 房子灯火通明。

en: I left my card at home.
zh: 我把卡落在家里了。

en: I have spent a lot of money on my house.
zh: 我花了很多钱在我的房子上。

en: We have two dogs. One is black and the other is white.
zh: 我们有两只狗。一只是黑色的，另一只是白色的。

en: I prefer going out to staying at home.
zh: 我宁愿出去也不愿待在家里。

en: I'm just going to stay home.
zh: 我只想待在家里。

en: I'll fix you some coffee.
zh: 我给你煮杯咖啡吧。

en: I may as well go out than stay at home.
zh: 我宁愿出去也不愿待在家里。

en: Staying home isn't fun.
zh: 待在家里不好玩。

en: When I'm at home there's a lot of stuff to do; I don't even have time to watch TV.
zh: 当我在家的时候有很多事情要做；我甚至没有时间看电视。

en: I would rather stay at home.
zh: 我宁愿待在家里。

en: I'd rather stay at home.
zh: 我宁愿待在家里。

en: If you take your shoes off before coming into the house you won't bring in any dirt from your shoes.
zh: 如果你进屋前脱掉鞋子，你就不会把鞋子上的泥土带进来了。

en: Houses should be built so as to admit plenty of light as well as fresh air.
zh: 房子应该建造得能够采纳充足的光线和新鲜空气。

en: There was an unfortunate incident at home.
zh: 家里发生了一件不幸的事故。

en: If you wash it at home, the color will run.
zh: 如果你在家洗它，会掉色的。

en: I would rather go out than stay at home.
zh: 我宁愿出去也不愿待在家里。

en: We will purchase a new car next week.
zh: 我们下周将购买一辆新车。

en: Father is the heaviest of my family.
zh: 我爸爸是我们家最重的。

en: We had guests for dinner yesterday.
zh: 昨天我们有客人来吃晚饭。

en: Stop being lazy and find something to do.
zh: 别再懒了，找点事做。

en: Feeling the house shake, I ran out into the street.
zh: 感觉到房子在摇晃，我跑到了街上。

en: Feeling the house shake, I ran outside.
zh: 感觉到房子在摇晃，我跑到了外面。

en: Feeling the house shake, I ran out into the yard at the back of the house.
zh: 感觉到房子在摇晃，我跑到了房子后面的院子里。

en: As soon as he felt his house shake, he rushed out into the garden.
zh: 他一感觉到房子在摇晃，就冲到了花园里。

en: I felt the house shake.
zh: 我感觉到了房子在摇晃。

en: Don't you feel the house shaking?
zh: 你没感觉到房子在摇晃吗？

en: The house is on fire.
zh: 房子着火了。

en: Several houses were carried away by the great flood.
zh: 几栋房子被大洪水冲走了。

en: The house was carried away by the flood.
zh: 房子被洪水冲走了。

en: The house is on fire!
zh: 房子着火了！

en: How long does it take to go to the office from your home?
zh: 从你家到办公室要多久？

en: I see the tower from my house.
zh: 我在我家能看到那座塔。

en: How long does it take you to get here on foot from your home?
zh: 从你家走到这里要多久？

en: Don't go too far afield.
zh: 不要走得太远。

en: We felt the house shake a little.
zh: 我们感觉到房子稍微摇晃了一下。

en: I have three daughters to marry off.
zh: 我有三个女儿要嫁出去。

en: Mother-in-law and daughter-in-law are a tempest and hailstorm.
zh: 婆婆和媳妇是暴风雨。

en: Natsume Soseki is one of the best writers in Japan.
zh: 夏目漱石是日本最伟大的作家之一。

en: The summer goods are now on sale.
zh: 夏季商品现在正在打折。

en: Why don't you wear summer clothes?
zh: 你为什么不穿夏装呢？

en: The summer grass covers the ground.
zh: 夏天的草覆盖着地面。

en: Tokyo is subject to typhoons in summer.
zh: 东京夏天容易遭受台风侵袭。

en: I was away from home all through the summer vacation.
zh: 整个暑假我都不在家。

en: I usually went to bed at ten during the summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间我通常十点睡觉。

en: I visited Hokkaido during summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间我去了北海道。

en: I'm thinking of going to the States during the summer vacation.
zh: 我正在考虑暑假期间去美国。

en: They visited us at the camp during summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间，他们来营地拜访我们。

en: What do you say to making a trip with me during the summer vacation?
zh: 暑假期间和我一起去旅行怎么样？

en: The summer vacation has come to an end, and we will have to go back to school.
zh: 暑假结束了，我们不得不回到学校。

en: Summer vacation is near. Can you think of a good place for the holidays?
zh: 暑假快到了。你能想到一个适合度假的好地方吗？

en: The summer vacation is only a week away.
zh: 暑假只有一周的时间了。

en: We have five days to go before the summer vacation.
zh: 离暑假还有五天。

en: Summer vacation begins next Monday.
zh: 暑假下周一开始。

en: Summer vacation is near at hand.
zh: 暑假即将来临。

en: The summer vacation ended all too soon.
zh: 暑假结束得太快了。

en: Did you go anywhere during the summer vacation?
zh: 暑假期间你去哪里了吗？

en: How's your summer vacation going?
zh: 你的暑假过得怎么样？

en: How was your summer vacation?
zh: 你的暑假怎么样？

en: What did you do with your summer vacation?
zh: 你的暑假做了什么？

en: The summer vacation has come to an end too soon.
zh: 暑假结束得太快了。

en: The summer vacation begins in July.
zh: 暑假在七月开始。

en: The summer vacation lasts a couple of weeks.
zh: 暑假持续几个星期。
